A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Took aaages to get going but when it did\, holy fuck did it. Could have had a section in the middle taken out and a couple of plot points resolved quicker but the action and the art direction really shine\, covering some of the flaws. Hamill reminds us just how good he can be and the supporting cast all give their all. Ill watch it again and rate it more fairly then\, having suppressed the fanboy in me\, but I really enjoyed it.
